title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Section 21 Trails – Hartland Township, Michigan
content:
Photo submitted by Benjamin J. Guettler, “Frosty morning blue hour. Sled Hill Overlook (18°F, 6:45am), Section 21 Trails at Settlers Park, Michigan.” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with our readers around the world here on the Pic Of The Day.
